author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Custom Schluter shower curb tips…I’m using 2-inch KERDI-BOARD to build custom curbs. I use a Diablo framing blade to cut them. Then Schluter ALL-SET is used to bond the curbs together and against the shower tray, walls, & floor. These curbs are strong and will support any size shower door. Many thanks to @schlutersystemsna for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#schlutersystems #tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Custom Schluter Shower Curb Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
